data: The steamboat Manasquan was advertised to leave her pier on the east side of the city at half-past nine on a July morning.
pier | east side of the city

The steamboat _Manasquan_ was advertised to leave her pier on the east side of the city at half-past nine on a July morning.
Stockton, Frank R., 1834-1902; Frost, A. B. (Arthur Burdett), 1851-1928 [Illustrator]
